properties.entry: SELECT MB.MAILBOX_NO , MB.MAILBOX_NAME , COUNT(MO.MAIL_NO) AS "COUNT" FROM MAIL_OWNER MO RIGHT JOIN MAILBOX MB ON (MO.MAILBOX_NO = MB.MAILBOX_NO) WHERE MB.OWNER_NO = ? AND MB.MAILBOX_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY (MB.MAILBOX_NO, MB.MAILBOX_NAME) ORDER BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(MB.MAILBOX_NO, '^[a-zA-Z]+'), TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(MB.MAILBOX_NO, '[0-9]+')) ASC

SELECT MB.MAILBOX_NO , MB.MAILBOX_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(MO.MAILBOX_NO) FROM MAIL_OWNER MO WHERE MO.MAILBOX_NO = MB.MAILBOX_NO AND MO.MAIL_STATUS = 'Y') AS "COUNT" FROM MAILBOX MB WHERE MB.OWNER_NO = ? AND MB.MAILBOX_TYPE = 'P' AND MB.MAILBOX_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(MAIL_NO) AS "COUNT" FROM MAIL_RECEIVER WHERE RECEIVER_NO = ? AND MAIL_NO IN (SELECT MAIL_NO FROM MAIL WHERE IS_SENT = 'S') AND READ_TIME IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(MO.MAIL_NO) AS "COUNT" FROM MAIL_OWNER MO JOIN MAIL M ON (MO.MAIL_NO = M.MAIL_NO) WHERE MO.OWNER_NO = ? AND MO.MAIL_STAR = 'Y' AND MO.MAIL_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.IS_SENT = 'S'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MO.MAIL_NO , MB.MAILBOX_NAME , MO.MAIL_STAR , NVL2(MR.READ_TIME, 'Y', 'N') AS "IS_READ" , NVL(AC.COUNT, 0) AS "ATT_COUNT" , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , M.MAIL_TITLE , TO_CHAR(M.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI') AS "SEND_DATE" FROM MAIL_OWNER MO LEFT JOIN MAIL_RECEIVER MR ON (MO.MAIL_NO = MR.MAIL_NO) AND (MO.OWNER_NO = MR.RECEIVER_NO) JOIN MAIL M ON (MO.MAIL_NO = M.MAIL_NO) JOIN MAILBOX MB ON (MO.MAILBOX_NO = MB.MAILBOX_NO) JOIN USERS U ON (M.SENDER = U.USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (U.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REF_BNO AS MAIL_NO, COUNT(FILE_NO) AS COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_BNO ) AC ON (MO.MAIL_NO = AC.MAIL_NO) WHERE MO.OWNER_NO = ? AND MO.MAIL_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.IS_SENT = 'S' ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MO.MAIL_NO , MO.MAIL_STAR , NVL2(MR.READ_TIME, 'Y', 'N') AS "IS_READ" , NVL(AC.COUNT, 0) AS "ATT_COUNT" , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , M.MAIL_TITLE , DECODE(MR.RECEIVER_TYPE, 'R', '수신', 'C', '참조', 'S', '비밀') AS "RECEIVER_TYPE" , TO_CHAR(M.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI') AS "SEND_DATE" FROM MAIL_OWNER MO JOIN MAIL_RECEIVER MR ON (MO.MAIL_NO = MR.MAIL_NO) AND (MO.OWNER_NO = MR.RECEIVER_NO) JOIN MAIL M ON (MO.MAIL_NO = M.MAIL_NO) JOIN USERS U ON (M.SENDER = U.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (U.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REF_BNO AS MAIL_NO, COUNT(FILE_NO) AS COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_BNO ) AC ON (MO.MAIL_NO = AC.MAIL_NO) WHERE MO.MAILBOX_NO = (SELECT MAILBOX_NO FROM MAILBOX WHERE OWNER_NO = ? AND MAILBOX_NAME = '받은메일함') AND MO.MAIL_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.IS_SENT = 'S' ORDER BY M.SEND_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MO.MAIL_NO , MO.MAIL_STAR , NVL(AC.COUNT, 0) AS "ATT_COUNT" , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , M.MAIL_TITLE , TO_CHAR(M.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI') AS "SEND_DATE" FROM MAIL_OWNER MO JOIN MAIL M ON (MO.MAIL_NO = M.MAIL_NO) JOIN USERS U ON (M.SENDER = U.USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (U.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REF_BNO AS MAIL_NO, COUNT(FILE_NO) AS COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_BNO ) AC ON (MO.MAIL_NO = AC.MAIL_NO) WHERE MAILBOX_NO = ( SELECT MAILBOX_NO FROM MAILBOX WHERE OWNER_NO = ? AND MAILBOX_NAME = '보낸메일함' ) AND MO.MAIL_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.IS_SENT = 'S'OR M.IS_SENT = 'C' ORDER BY M.SEND_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MO.MAIL_NO , MO.MAIL_STAR , NVL(AC.COUNT, 0) AS "ATT_COUNT" , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , M.MAIL_TITLE , TO_CHAR(M.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI') AS "SEND_DATE" FROM MAIL_OWNER MO JOIN MAIL M ON (MO.MAIL_NO = M.MAIL_NO) JOIN USERS U ON (M.SENDER = U.USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (U.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REF_BNO AS MAIL_NO, COUNT(FILE_NO) AS COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_BNO ) AC ON (MO.MAIL_NO = AC.MAIL_NO) WHERE MO.MAILBOX_NO = (SELECT MAILBOX_NO FROM MAILBOX WHERE OWNER_NO = ? AND MAILBOX_NAME = '임시보관함') AND MO.MAIL_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.IS_SENT = 'T' ORDER BY M.SEND_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MO.MAIL_NO , MO.MAIL_STAR , NVL2(MR.READ_TIME, 'Y', 'N') AS "IS_READ" , NVL(AC.COUNT, 0) AS "ATT_COUNT" , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , M.MAIL_TITLE , TO_CHAR(M.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI') AS "SEND_DATE" FROM MAIL_OWNER MO JOIN MAIL_RECEIVER MR ON (MO.MAIL_NO = MR.MAIL_NO) AND (MO.OWNER_NO = MR.RECEIVER_NO) JOIN MAIL M ON (MO.MAIL_NO = M.MAIL_NO) JOIN USERS U ON (M.SENDER = U.USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (U.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REF_BNO AS MAIL_NO, COUNT(FILE_NO) AS COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_BNO ) AC ON (MO.MAIL_NO = AC.MAIL_NO) WHERE MO.MAILBOX_NO = (SELECT MAILBOX_NO FROM MAILBOX WHERE OWNER_NO = ? AND MAILBOX_NAME = '내게쓴메일함') AND MO.MAIL_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.IS_SENT = 'S' ORDER BY M.SEND_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MO.MAIL_NO , MO.MAIL_STAR , NVL(AC.COUNT, 0) AS "ATT_COUNT" , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , M.MAIL_TITLE , TO_CHAR(M.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI') AS "SEND_DATE" FROM MAIL_OWNER MO JOIN MAIL M ON (MO.MAIL_NO = M.MAIL_NO) JOIN USERS U ON (M.SENDER = U.USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (U.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REF_BNO AS MAIL_NO, COUNT(FILE_NO) AS COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_BNO ) AC ON (MO.MAIL_NO = AC.MAIL_NO) WHERE MO.MAILBOX_NO = (SELECT MAILBOX_NO FROM MAILBOX WHERE OWNER_NO = ? AND MAILBOX_NAME = '휴지통') AND MO.MAIL_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY M.SEND_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MR.MAIL_NO , MO.MAIL_STAR , NVL2(MR.READ_TIME, 'Y', 'N') AS "IS_READ" , NVL(AC.COUNT, 0) AS "ATT_COUNT" , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , M.MAIL_TITLE , DECODE(MR.RECEIVER_TYPE, 'R', '수신', 'C', '참조', 'S', '비밀') AS "RECEIVER_TYPE" , TO_CHAR(M.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI') AS "SEND_DATE" FROM MAIL_RECEIVER MR JOIN MAIL M ON (MR.MAIL_NO = M.MAIL_NO) JOIN MAIL_OWNER MO ON (MR.MAIL_NO = MO.MAIL_NO) AND (MR.RECEIVER_NO = MO.OWNER_NO) JOIN USERS U ON M.SENDER = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON U.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REF_BNO AS MAIL_NO, COUNT(FILE_NO) AS COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_BNO ) AC ON (MO.MAIL_NO = AC.MAIL_NO) WHERE MR.RECEIVER_NO = ? AND MR.READ_TIME IS NULL ORDER BY M.SEND_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MO.MAIL_NO , MB.MAILBOX_NAME , MO.MAIL_STAR , CASE WHEN MAILBOX_NAME = '보낸메일함' THEN 'Y' WHEN MR.READ_TIME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS "IS_READ" , NVL(AC.COUNT, 0) AS "ATT_COUNT" , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , M.MAIL_TITLE , TO_CHAR(M.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI') AS "SEND_DATE" FROM MAIL_OWNER MO JOIN MAIL M ON (MO.MAIL_NO = M.MAIL_NO) JOIN MAILBOX MB ON (MO.MAILBOX_NO = MB.MAILBOX_NO) LEFT JOIN MAIL_RECEIVER MR ON (MO.MAIL_NO = MR.MAIL_NO) AND (MO.OWNER_NO = MR.RECEIVER_NO) JOIN USERS U ON (M.SENDER = U.USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (U.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REF_BNO AS MAIL_NO, COUNT(FILE_NO) AS COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_BNO ) AC ON (MO.MAIL_NO = AC.MAIL_NO) WHERE MO.OWNER_NO = ? AND MO.MAIL_STAR = 'Y' AND MO.MAIL_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.IS_SENT = 'S' ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MO.MAIL_NO , MO.MAIL_STAR , NVL2(MR.READ_TIME, 'Y', 'N') AS "IS_READ" , NVL(AC.COUNT, 0) AS "ATT_COUNT" , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , M.MAIL_TITLE , TO_CHAR(M.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI') AS "SEND_DATE" FROM MAIL_OWNER MO JOIN MAIL M ON (MO.MAIL_NO = M.MAIL_NO) JOIN MAIL_RECEIVER MR ON (MO.OWNER_NO = MR.RECEIVER_NO) AND (MO.MAIL_NO = MR.MAIL_NO) JOIN USERS U ON (M.SENDER = U.USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (U.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REF_BNO AS MAIL_NO, COUNT(FILE_NO) AS COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_BNO ) AC ON (MO.MAIL_NO = AC.MAIL_NO) WHERE MO.MAILBOX_NO = ? AND MO.MAIL_STATUS = 'Y' ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT M.MAIL_NO , MO.MAIL_STAR , M.MAIL_TITLE , U1.USER_NAME , U1.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , TO_CHAR(M.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI') AS "SEND_DATE" , M.MAIL_CONTENT FROM MAIL M JOIN MAIL_OWNER MO ON (MO.OWNER_NO = ?) AND (M.MAIL_NO = MO.MAIL_NO) JOIN USERS U1 ON (M.SENDER = U1.USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (U1.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO) WHERE M.MAIL_NO = ?

SELECT MR.MAIL_NO , MR.RECEIVER_NO , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , DECODE(MR.RECEIVER_TYPE, 'R', '수신', 'C', '참조', 'S', '비밀') AS "RECEIVER_TYPE" , NVL(TO_CHAR(MR.READ_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI'), '읽지않음') AS "READ_TIME" FROM MAIL_RECEIVER MR JOIN USERS U ON (MR.RECEIVER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE MR.MAIL_NO = ? ORDER BY U.USER_NAME ASC
SELECT CASE WHEN RECEIVER_TYPE IS NULL THEN 'TOTAL' ELSE RECEIVER_TYPE END AS RECEIVER_TYPE, COUNT(RECEIVER_TYPE) AS COUNT FROM MAIL_RECEIVER WHERE MAIL_NO = ? GROUP BY ROLLUP(RECEIVER_TYPE)
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MAIL_OWNER SET MAIL_STAR = ? WHERE OWNER_NO = ? AND MAIL_NO = ?
SELECT NVL2(READ_TIME, 'Y', 'N') AS "IS_READ" FROM MAIL_RECEIVER WHERE RECEIVER_NO = ? AND MAIL_NO = ?
UPDATE MAIL_RECEIVER SET READ_TIME = NULL WHERE RECEIVER_NO = ? AND MAIL_NO = ?
UPDATE MAIL_RECEIVER SET READ_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE RECEIVER_NO = ? AND MAIL_NO = ?
INSERT INTO MAIL ( MAIL_NO , SENDER , MAIL_TITLE , MAIL_CONTENT , IS_SENT , SEND_DATE ) VALUES ( 'M' || SEQ_MAILNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , UPLOAD_DATE , STATUS ) VALUES ( 'A' || SEQ_FILENO.NEXTVAL , 'M' || SEQ_MAILNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'Y' )
INSERT INTO MAIL_RECEIVER ( MAIL_NO , RECEIVER_NO , RECEIVER_TYPE , READ_TIME ) VALUES ( 'M' || SEQ_MAILNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , NULL )
INSERT INTO MAIL_OWNER ( OWNER_NO , MAIL_NO , MAILBOX_NO , MAIL_STAR , MAIL_STATUS ) VALUES ( ? , 'M' || SEQ_MAILNO.CURRVAL , ? , 'N' , 'Y' )
SELECT MAILBOX_NO FROM MAILBOX WHERE OWNER_NO = ? AND MAILBOX_NAME = '보낸메일함'
SELECT MAILBOX_NO FROM MAILBOX WHERE OWNER_NO = ? AND MAILBOX_NAME = '받은메일함'
SELECT MAILBOX_NO FROM MAILBOX WHERE OWNER_NO = ? AND MAILBOX_NAME = '내게쓴메일함'
SELECT MAILBOX_NO FROM MAILBOX WHERE OWNER_NO = ? AND MAILBOX_NAME = '임시보관함'
SELECT USER_NO , USER_NAME , USER_ID FROM USERS WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY USER_NAME, USER_ID
SELECT USER_NO , USER_NAME , USER_ID FROM USERS WHERE USER_AUTH = 'U' AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY USER_NAME, USER_ID
SELECT USER_NO , USER_NAME , USER_ID FROM USERS WHERE USER_AUTH = 'A' AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY USER_NAME, USER_ID
SELECT CONTACTS_NO , CONTACTS_NAME FROM CONTACTS WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CONTACTS_TYPE = 'S' ORDER BY CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_NO
SELECT CONTACTS_NO , CONTACTS_NAME FROM CONTACTS WHERE STATUS ='Y' AND CONTACTS_TYPE = 'P' AND OWNER_NO = ? ORDER BY CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_NO
SELECT CM.USER_NO , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID FROM CONTACTS_MEMBER CM JOIN USERS U ON (CM.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE CM.CONTACTS_NO = ? ORDER BY U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT M.MAIL_NO , M.SENDER , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , M.MAIL_TITLE , M.MAIL_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(M.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DY) HH24:MI') AS "SEND_DATE" FROM MAIL M JOIN USERS U ON (M.SENDER = U.USER_NO) WHERE M.MAIL_NO = ?

SELECT MR.MAIL_NO , MR.RECEIVER_NO , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , DECODE(MR.RECEIVER_TYPE, 'R', '수신', 'C', '참조', 'S', '비밀') AS "RECEIVER_TYPE" FROM MAIL_RECEIVER MR JOIN USERS U ON (MR.RECEIVER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE MR.MAIL_NO = ? AND MR.RECEIVER_TYPE = 'R' ORDER BY U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT MR.MAIL_NO , MR.RECEIVER_NO , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , DECODE(MR.RECEIVER_TYPE, 'R', '수신', 'C', '참조', 'S', '비밀') AS "RECEIVER_TYPE" FROM MAIL_RECEIVER MR JOIN USERS U ON (MR.RECEIVER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE MR.MAIL_NO = ? AND MR.RECEIVER_TYPE = 'C' ORDER BY U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT MR.MAIL_NO , MR.RECEIVER_NO , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , MR.RECEIVER_TYPE FROM MAIL_RECEIVER MR JOIN USERS U ON (MR.RECEIVER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE MR.MAIL_NO = ? AND MR.RECEIVER_TYPE IN ('R', 'C') ORDER BY MR.RECEIVER_TYPE DESC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT MR.MAIL_NO , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , M.MAIL_TITLE FROM MAIL_RECEIVER MR JOIN MAIL M ON (MR.MAIL_NO = M.MAIL_NO) JOIN USERS U ON (M.SENDER = U.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (U.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO) WHERE MR.RECEIVER_NO = ? AND M.IS_SENT = 'S' AND M.SEND_DATE >= SYSDATE - INTERVAL '10' SECOND ORDER BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(MR.MAIL_NO, '^[a-zA-Z]+'), TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(MR.MAIL_NO, '[0-9]+')) DESC
